element <fileDerivationVars> (global)
Namespace:
ddi:codebook:2_6
Type:
fileDerivationVarsType
Content:
complex, 3 elements
Defined:
globally in codebook.xsd; see XML source
Used:
never
XML Representation Summary
<fileDerivationVars>
   
Content: 
keep?, drop?, add?
</fileDerivationVars>
Content model elements (3):
add, drop, keep
Annotation

File Derivation Variables

Description

"keep" - space delimited ID references to the target variables that were kept as part of this file level command.

"drop" - space delimited ID references to the source variables that were dropped as part of this file level command

"add" - space delimited ID references to the target variables that were created as part of this file level command

Example

<keep>V1 V2 V5</keep> <drop>V3</drop> <add>V16</add>
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
<xs:element name="fileDerivationVars" type="fileDerivationVarsType"/>
